8. In the fifth row (match 5), the score is 4-0, which is not a tie.

9. In the sixth row (match 6), the score is 2-1, which is not a tie.

10. Since only one game (match 2) ended in a tie and all other games did not, it can be concluded that "all the match results do NOT end in a tie".
